metadata.title: CVE-2024-35864 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: smb:client: fix potential UAF in smb2_is_valid_lease_break() Skip sessions thatare being teared down (status == SES_EXITING) to avoid UAF.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-aws-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
